segment.source: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components
segment.target: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components

segment.source: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components
segment.target: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components

segment.source: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components
segment.target: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components

segment.source: You can use the following procedures to remove all or selected Application Virtualization software components from a target computer.
segment.target: You can use the following procedures to remove all or selected Application Virtualization software components from a target computer.

segment.source: To remove all components from a single computer
segment.target: To remove all components from a single computer

segment.source: From the Windows desktop, click Start Settings Control Panel.
segment.target: From the Windows desktop, click Start Settings Control Panel.

segment.source: In the Control Panel window, double-click Add or Remove Programs.
segment.target: In the Control Panel window, double-click Add or Remove Programs.

segment.source: On the Add or Remove Programs page, select Microsoft System Center Application Virtual Management Server or Microsoft System Center Application Streaming Server, click Remove, and then click Yes at the prompt to remove all Application Virtualization software components from the computer.
segment.target: On the Add or Remove Programs page, select Microsoft System Center Application Virtual Management Server or Microsoft System Center Application Streaming Server, click Remove, and then click Yes at the prompt to remove all Application Virtualization software components from the computer.

segment.source: To remove one or more components from a computer
segment.target: To remove one or more components from a computer

segment.source: Navigate to the location of the Application Virtualization System setup program on the network, either run this program from the network or copy its directory to the target computer, and then double-click Setup.exe.
segment.target: Navigate to the location of the Application Virtualization System setup program on the network, either run this program from the network or copy its directory to the target computer, and then double-click Setup.exe.

segment.source: On the Welcome page, click Next.
segment.target: On the Welcome page, click Next.

segment.source: On the Program Maintenance page, select Modify and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Program Maintenance page, select Modify and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Custom Setup page, deselect the Application Virtualization component or components you want to remove, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Custom Setup page, deselect the Application Virtualization component or components you want to remove, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Ready to Modify the Program page, to remove the selected components, click Install.
segment.target: On the Ready to Modify the Program page, to remove the selected components, click Install.

segment.source: On the Installation Wizard Completed page, to close the wizard click Finish.
segment.target: On the Installation Wizard Completed page, to close the wizard click Finish.

segment.source: Click Yes to restart the computer.
segment.target: Click Yes to restart the computer.

segment.source: How to Install the Servers and System Components
segment.target: How to Install the Servers and System Components
